sentences.en: At the nadir of her career, she was given a great encouragement by his marrying her.
sentences.cn: 在她事业处于低谷时, 他和她结婚给了她巨大的鼓励.

sentences.en: He assisted me with good counsel and encouragement.
sentences.cn: 他以良好的忠告和鼓励帮助我

sentences.en: He gave great encouragement to his students, especially if their passions happened to coincide with his own.
sentences.cn: 他给予学生莫大的鼓励，尤其是当他们与自己志趣相投时。

sentences.en: His encouragement buoyed her up during that difficult period.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓励使她在那段困难时期恢复了乐观的情绪.

sentences.en: His encouragement gave me a hot sense of uplift.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓励激发了我的上进心.

sentences.en: I also had friends who gave me a great deal of encouragement.
sentences.cn: 我还有些朋友给了我很多鼓励。

sentences.en: It was her teacher's encouragement that led her into acting.
sentences.cn: 她老师的鼓励促使她从事了演戏这一行当.

sentences.en: Raised by adoptive parents , Hill received early encouragement in her musical proclivities.
sentences.cn: 希尔由养父母带大, 从小,她的音乐爱好就受到了鼓励.

sentences.en: Thanks for your advice and encouragement.
The encouragement of a friend spurred Chris into switching jobs.
sentences.cn: 在一位朋友的鼓励下，克理斯换了工作。

sentences.en: The encouragement that young boys receive builds a greater self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 小男孩受到的鼓励会增强他们的自信心。

sentences.en: This is an encouragement [ impetus ] to us.
sentences.cn: 这是对我们的 鞭策.

sentences.en: When money falls in value, there is no encouragement to save.
sentences.cn: 货币贬值时, 就无法鼓励人们储蓄.

sentences.en: With encouragement, Sally is starting to play with the other children.
sentences.cn: 萨莉受到了鼓励，开始和其他孩子玩起来。

sentences.en: Your encouragement will stimulate me to further efforts.
sentences.cn: 你的鼓励会激发我进一步努力.

words.tran_cn: 令人鼓舞的；鼓励的，奖励的

trans.tran_en: when you encourage someone or something, or the things that encourage them
